sources.title: Men of Steel (1937) Secret identities & molten steel: an heir's dangerous gamble
sources.description:
When steel magnate William Reardon passes, his surprising will forces his son Bill Junior to trade silk suits for steel boots! Working incognito as "Bill Hall" in his own mill, he must survive a year under tough foreman 'Tons' Walker to claim his inheritance. Sparks fly when Bill falls for worker Mary, igniting a rivalry with Walker in this gritty yet charming factory-floor drama.

Original title: Bill Cracks Down (1937)
Black & White version: https://youtu.be/um8mb4xTQ8U

Directed by William Nigh
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdZXzNlrriwdV2VH5iA9980j

Edgar Norton - Jarvis (the Butler)
Harry Depp - Smalley (the Lawyer)
Eugene King - Zimich
Landers Stevens - Dr. Colcord
Eddie 'Rochester' Anderson - Chauffeur

metadata.Plot: In this short subject the employees of the Homey Foamy Washing Machine factory decide to put on a show. It is picked up by a Broadway producer. The show moves on to Broadway, and the factory suffers the loss of key employees. The owners try to get the workers to return to their old jobs.
metadata.Writer: Edwin Stanley, George Brandt, Stanley Rauh
metadata.Actors: Kenny Stevens, Doris Weston, Andrew Tombes
